name: Logantubbies (Mod out of Slendytubbies)
description:
Original: Slendytubbies 1 by Zeoworks http://zeoworks.com/forum/portal.php (all credit goes to them heh)

(this game is meant to be taken 100% seriously)

This game you (Logandabro) have to collect all ten doge coins, but watch out there's always a catch. Ray William Johnson creator of  Your Favorite Martian is chasing you trying to stop you from collecting his doge coins. Collect all ten doge coins to win.

(THIS GAME CAN CAUSE SERIOUS HORROR AND epilepsy(i think))

(tell me that if there is any bugs please please please i will try to fix it)
